description: Parse ARINC-429 Label 230 (Pedal Position) bits 11-29 using BNR encoding.
The parity bit (bit 32) of all incoming ARINC labels shall be verified using an Odd Parity check.
If Label 310 SSM is 11 2 (Failure)
Apply a 4-sample moving average filter to the Pedal_Input value.
Map output pressure command to a 12-bit DAC
Calculate Normalized Pedal (D pedal) as (Input−Min)/(Max−Min).
Calculate Wheel Deceleration (a w) as Δω/ΔT.
Set Reference Velocity decay rate to 10 ft/s during signal loss.
Calculate Slip Ratio (S) as (V ref −V wheel )/V ref
Use Antiskid Proportional Gain (K p) = 1.25.
Limit PID Integral wind-up to 500.
Hard-limit pressure command to 3
Execute main control loop at 100 Hz.
Increment WoW persistence counter every 10 ms.
Release Touchdown protection when WoW counter reaches 300.
Latch "Antiskid Fault" if persistent for >500 ms.
Execute PBIT in INIT state before STANDBY.
Use Channel B data if Channel A is invalid.
Detect Valve Failure if feedback < 100 psi while command > 1
Clear volatile fault registers on hard reset.
Swap Primary/Secondary ARINC buses if error count > 10.
Trigger SYSTEM_HALT on NVM Checksum Error.
Auto-Brake LO targets 5.0±0.2 ft/s
Auto-Brake MED targets 8.0±0.2 ft/s
Auto-Brake MAX targets 12.0±0.5 ft/s
Disarm Auto-Brake if pedal deflection > 10%.
Control Servo Valve via 2 kHz PWM signal.
Drive SHUTOFF_ENABLE GPIO HIGH for isolation.
ADC pressure feedback resolution shall be ≥10 bits.
De-bounce Parking Brake switch for 40 ms.
Set Label 270 Bit 15 to 1 when Antiskid is Active.
Set Label 270 Bits 16-17 for Health Status encoding.
Clear ARINC TX buffer after successful broadcast.
Measure Control_Task time using hardware timer.
Raise TIMING_VIOLATION if task execution > 8 ms.
